document.title: Annual Report of the Tennessee Agricultural Experiment Station, 1989

author.organization: University of Tennessee Agricultural Experiment Station

field.name: comments
field.value:
Knoxville, Tennessee

January 2, 1990

To His Excellency, Ned McWherter

Governor of Tennessee:

SIR: I have the honor of transmitting herewith, on behalf of the Board of Trustees of The University of Tennessee, a report of the work and expenditures of the Agricultural Experiment Station for the year 1989.

This report is submitted in accordance with the law requiring that such a report be submitted annually by the administrators of the Experiment Station to the Governor of the State.

Respectfully submitted,

Lamar Alexander, President
